name: Acria.AI
public_notice: ACRIA (acria) has rebranded to Acria.AI (acria). For more information, please view this announcement on their Twitter.
additional_notices: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en: The Acria IntelliChain is an EVM-compatible smart contract platform that seeks to democratize the AI space, thus driving innovation and progress. Our ecosystem allows for the efficient exchange and sharing of training data on the blockchain, enabling us to foster a fairer and more inclusive AI landscape.
